> ::Dark Rodimus::
> 
> Rodimus opens up a access hatch on his left wrist.
=
> He pulls out two wires and connects to some ports
> on the pods control p=
anel.
>
> Rodimus: I've connected to the pod. You can start
> downloading t=
hrough my systems across the commlink.
> I think it'll work as a decent dat=
alink.

Even as Rodimus worked to gather information, outside a few sweeps =

led by their feral master Scourge touched down. With their sensor 
scatter=
ing armor they were virtually undetectable, and their 
movements were steal=
thy and swift. 

While Scourge could not pick up Rodimus directly, the trai=
l he had 
left behind him had led here. Sweeps were designed to be hunters =
and 
trackers, and to follow such a scent was child's play. Yet Scourge 
co=
uld not repress a shudder of eagerness as he imagined the 
culmination of t=
his hunt: Rodimus! He frowned as he knew that this 
was not Rodimus PRIME, =
and yet he was something more than Hot Rod. 
Scourge had been somewhat conf=
used by the readings Cyclonus had shown 
him from the memory download. 

Wi=
th a shrug he motioned to the sweeps for them to spread out and 
begin sear=
ching for their quarry as Scourge followed the scent 
further onwards. Quic=
kly the sweeps complied, weapons drawn and 
ready, they all began to move a=
mongst the building(s).

e. Is there
